name: Aerial Rave
description:
Ever wonder what Devil May Cry would be like if the entire game was in the air?

Climb as high as you can while making sure to be stylish! Rack up kills and altitude while avoiding falling to your death!

This game was an entry in the 2022 January Juicejam gamejam and is my first time doing a solo gamejam! I will very likely release an updated version in the future, so if you're interested you should follow me!
